item.title: U.K. ‘Grooming Gangs’ Scandal Could Happen In The U.S. Thanks To Leftist Justice System
item.description: The same conditions that allowed rape gangs to run rampant in the U.K. are already in place in some U.S. jurisdictions.

item.title: Court Strikes Down Biden’s Title IX Trans Overhaul Nationwide
item.description: A U.S. district court struck down President Joe Biden’s queer theory rewrite of Title IX nationwide on Thursday, blocking his administration from atte...

item.title: If Karen Bass Isn’t Recalled, Prosecuted, Or Forced To Resign, Democracy Is Wasted On L.A.
item.description: "Unprecedented" is an insult to the intelligence of every newly homeless, property-tax-paying citizen.

item.title: The Entire Propaganda Press Is As Fake As David Muir’s Fireman Costume
item.description: David Muir's Firefighter Barbie outfit wasn't the first or most obvious indication that the institution he represents is fake news.

item.title: Democrats Who Exacerbated California Blazes Give Angelenos A Giant Middle Finger
item.description: At every turn, national and state politicians have failed to do their duty to the taxpayers and feign even an ounce of sympathy.
